definitions.text: a person who enjoys telling or playing jokes
a person who does something thoughtless or annoying
examples: some joker is blocking the driveway

definitions.text: an inconspicuous clause in a document or bill that affects its meaning in a way that is not immediately apparent
examples: when I demanded my money he showed me the joker in the contract

definitions.text: a playing card that is usually printed with a picture of a jester
